title: Arts of Japan
brief_description: This film tells the story of a young American who visits artists of Japan, including the painter Gyokudo Kawai, tea master Soshitsu Sen, actors Koshiro Mataumoto and Manzaburo Umewaka, potter Shoju Hamada, and wood-block artist Shiko Manakata. Includes scenes from the Noh and Kabuki dramas.
